name: Barebones Living Galvanized Steel Watering Can - Comfort Grip 1.5 gal.
description: Our galvanized steel watering can features a riveted circular handle that provides a comfortable grip while carrying or pouring. The screw-on spout can be removed for a faster flow and makes cleaning a breeze.
